title: Bertie Farts in Class
description: The Golden Rule of Farting: One never passes wind in public. Bertie Farts in Class is a hilarious tale that will have you in stitches. Follow a young boy’s first encounter with farting in public, he is teased and taught the golden rule of farting but soon discovers that birthday wishes can come true and that some rules are meant to be broken Readers are calling it “A breath of fresh air!” These readers must live in stinky locations; let us spare a thought for them. Amendment to The Golden Rule of Farting: One pretends not to have passed wind in public. *wink*
author: Bernadine Wilsenach
